籤詩版本二:
Kyakkyawar dabi'a daga uba zuwa danta ana mika su ga jika, wadata da abinci da sutura ta dogara ga Allah kawai.
Chunxuan a cikin zauren yana faranta wa mutane farin ciki.
詩意:
An haɗa wannan hexagram tare da hoton bamboo wanda ke kaiwa zuwa bazara.
Da fatan komai ya tafi daidai.
解曰: Ɗauki bamboo kuma kai ga bazara. Yana yaduwa ba iyaka. Mutumin kirki yana neman bege. Duk sun yi murna.
籤詩故事一:
◇Sarkin Wu na Zhou ya hau karagar mulki
Sarki Wu na Zhou ya kai wa sarki Zhou hari inda ya jagoranci hakimai dari takwas don yakar sojojin sarki Shang, sojojin da ke Chaoge (babban birnin sarki Shang) su ma suka juya wa sarki Shang suka ci amanar sarki Shang.
Sarki Zhou ya kona kansa a Hasumiyar Zhaixing, kuma an lalata daular Shang.
Sarki Wu ya karbi littafin zinariya da dukiyar zinariya, wato gadon sarautar sarki, ya fuskanci kudu, hannayensa a dunkule, ya zauna a mike. Sarki Wu ya ba da umarnin a raba kadarorin Lutai, a rushe hasumiyar Tauraro, sannan a raba hatsin shinkafa da aka ajiye a Juqiao.
A saki Jizi da ke kurkuku a gyara kabarin Bigan. Sarki Wu ya hau kofar gidan mai hikima Shang Rong ya sunkuyar da kansa. Ku girmama salihai da kyawawan halaye, ku saki bayi a cikin gidan sarauta.
Ya kuma dakatar da makamai da inganta al'adu da ilimi. A kudancin Nanshan, ana kiwo da dawakai, ana kiwo da shanu a karkara da itatuwan peach, wuri ne na lumana.
聖意: Gidan ba shi da kyau (sa'a), za ku iya yin burin ku (sa'a), neman kuɗi, yin ciniki, ku yi aure (gadu da suruki nagari), Liujia tana lafiya (zodiac). Alama), masu tafiya a ƙasa suna ƙaura zuwa gonaki, tsutsotsin siliki sun yi sa’a, dabbobi shida sun lalace, mutane suna da wahalar samu (duba), ƙarar jama’a, masu martaba suna motsawa, an rasa sa’a ana ganin cututtuka da cututtuka.
古人: Sarki Wu na Zhou ya hau karagar mulki
第X籤: Nasara ta hamsin da biyar ta lashe cacar caca (lotting)
